smileguess-server/models/Game.js
Game
description:
The Game model persists data about a single game room, including players, dealer
and other state information. Should be instantiated when a brand new game room is
created, otherwise retrieved from the Games collection.

name: constructor
description: Constructor to instantiate a new Game instance.

name: solutionForDisplay
description:
This property defines the "solution" that the "dealer"
must communicate via emojis

name: solutionForMatching
description:
This property prevents correct answers from being deemed
incorrect due to capitilization, special characters, etc.

name: category
description: This property will communicate the solution's category to all players

name: active
description: This property will prevent the game from running until sufficient players have joined

name: smileguess-server/models/User.js
smileguess-server/sockets/dummySocketData.js
smileguess-server/sockets/joinRandomGame.js
joinRandomGame
description:
Function is called when a socket action is received
from the client requesting to join a random game.
A game is chosen, the user joins the socket room for
that game, and the other players are sent a 
'SOCKET_PLAYER_JOIN_GAME' action

params.name: user
params.description: The user object of the user joining

name: smileguess-server/sockets/onConnect.js
onConnect
description: Function for setting up a users socket connection

name: smileguess-server/sockets/onDisconnect.js
onDisconnect
description: The onDisonnect function is used to clean up a users connection to a game

name: smileguess-server/sockets/sendClueMessage.js
sendClueMessage
description:
This function sends a clue message to all the members of a room through sockets.
When this action is received on the client, it will be dispatched by redux automatically.
examples:
<caption>The action emitted:</caption>
let action = {
  type: 'SOCKET_CLUE_MESSAGE',
  userid: 5,
  message: 'üìµüêì üå∏',
};

params.name: action
params.description: the action passed to the server from the client

name: smileguess-server/sockets/sendGuessMessage.js
sendGuessMessage
description:
This function sends a guess message to all the members of a room through sockets.
When this action is received on the client, it will be dispatched by redux automatically.
examples:
<caption>The action emitted:</caption>
let action = {
  type: 'SOCKET_GUESS_MESSAGE',
  userid: 5,
  message: 'this will blow your mind!',
};

params.name: action
params.description: the action passed to the server from the client

name: smileguess-server/sockets/sendPlayerJoinGame.js
sendPlayerJoinGame
description:
This function sends a message letting the users of a
game know that another user has joined.

params.name: user
params.description: the user object of the user joining

name: smileguess-server/sockets/sendWinner.js
sendWinner
description:
This function sends a clue message to all the members of a room through sockets.
When this action is received on the client, it will be dispatched by redux automatically.
examples:
<caption>The action emitted:</caption>
let action = {
  type: 'SOCKET_DECLARE_WINNER',
  userid: 5,
};

params.name: user
params.description: the user for the particular socket
